title: Trade in after the fact
content:
I purchased the Pixel 4 XL from the Fi app. It did not give me the option of the trade in. Now that I have my Pixel 4 XL, there doesn't seem to be a way to trade in my Pixel 2 XL.

So am I stuck with my Pixel 2 XL? How can King Google not have a way to trade in a phone on the app?
